title: Comfortable simplicity is unveiled in this airy, top-floor residence.
posting_body: ['Comfortable simplicity is unveiled in this airy, top-floor residence.', 'Fresh wall color and handsome new floors flows throughout an open floor plan illuminated w/ generous natural light.', 'Lofty vaulted ceilings draw the eyes upwards, expanding the living space further.', 'A tiled fireplace anchors a living room w/ a cozy nook ideal for a home office space.', 'Sliding glass doors open to reveal a covered balcony — the perfect setting to enjoy relaxing and dining al fresco.', 'Light wood cabinetry in a classic kitchen offers plentiful storage for cooking and baking essentials while an adjoined dining area presents room for gathering w/ guests.', 'A sizable bedroom features a walk-in closet and ample sunlight.', 'Nearby, a large laundry room w/ built-in shelving is an added convenience.', 'Residents enjoy ample parking space and close proximity to retail, restaurants and open space + nature trails at Chatfield State Park.', 'Redstone Ridge community amenities include a pool, fitness center, clubhouse and more.']
